attributes.action: Allow Mark Coleman to remain and work in the UK
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Mark Coleman is facing deportation back to Zimbabwe. We are about to deport him  even though all his relatives – parents, brothers, sisters – have now fled the Mugabe tyranny and there is no life for him there.

Above all, though, the Home Office is about to kick this man out when his immediate antecedents are completely and utterly British.

government_responses.details:
